So what was the story of Procrustes?
He was at Procrustes who adjusted the length of his.
So he had a special bed, Procrustes' bed, certain length.
And then he had visitors coming.
And instead of adjusting the length of the bed to fit the visitor, Procrustes adjusted the length of the visitor to fit the bed.

So anyway, the Greeks liked this sort of thing.
So anyway, that's a Greek myth for 18.065.
So the whole idea of the Procrustes problem is to make something fit something else.

I have two vectors here.

And over here, I have people, space scientists might have one computation of the positions of satellites.
